sentence: But he’s held off on endorsing a Senate candidate to go up against incumbent Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly.
title: Trump kicks off midterm year still stuck on last election

sentence: The award application received widespread support including US Senator Krysten Sinema, US Senator Mark Kelly, US Congressman Paul Gosar, US Congresswoman Debbie Lesko, Governor Doug Ducey, AZ Senator Sonny Borrelli, AZ Representative Regina Cobb, AZ Representative Leo Biasiucci, and AZ Corporation Commission Chairwoman Lea Marquez Peterson.

title: Mohave Electric Cooperative receives national accolades for Fiber Project

sentence: And quite frankly, politically, this is going to be a hard year for U.S. Sen. Mark Kelly, between the inflation that’s going on in Arizona and the border crisis that’s going on in Arizona’s border and across the nation.
author: Douglas Blair
title: Rep. Debbie Lesko Reveals GOP Plan to Lower Gas Prices
